  • Constructor Details

    • Storage

      public Storage​(int x, int y, int fruit)
      Constructor for setting coordinates and the number of fruit it stores.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      fruit - The amount of fruit to be stored.

  • Method Details

    • getFruit

      public int getFruit()
      Gets the amount of fruit held by this Actor.
      Returns:
      The amount of fruit held.

    • setFruit

      public void setFruit​(int fruit)
      Updates the amount of fruit held by this Actor.
      Parameters:
      fruit - The amount of fruit that it will now hold.

    • add

      public void add()
      Adds the image of the Actor that can store fruit to the display at its position. A number indicating the number of fruit held is shown next to its image unless it is storing an infinite amount of fruit.
      Overrides:
      add in class Actor
